data.data:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    layout_width="fill_parent"
    layout_height="wrap_content"
    background="#FFFFFFFF"
    orientation="vertical" >

    <TextView
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="wrap_content"
        layout_marginLeft="10dp"
        layout_marginRight="10dp"
        layout_marginTop="10dp"
        background="#FFFFFFFF"
        function="title_bar"
        gravity="center_vertical"
        paddingLeft="7.5dp"
        textColor="#FFFFFFFF"
        textSize="13dp" />

</LinearLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    layout_width="fill_parent"
    layout_height="wrap_content"
    background="#FFFFFFFF"
    function="adv_content"
    orientation="vertical"
    paddingTop="10dp" >

    <ImageView
        id="@+id/index_item_adv_img"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="wrap_content"
        click="true"
        contentDescription="@null"
        function="adv_image"
        scaleType="fitXy" />

    <ImageView
        id="@+id/index_item_adv_line"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="wrap_content"
        layout_marginLeft="10dp"
        layout_marginRight="10dp"
        layout_marginTop="10dp"
        contentDescription="@null"
        scaleType="fitXY"
        src="line" />

</LinearLayout>

list.default_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    id="@+id/frame_linear_layout"
    layout_width="fill_parent"
    layout_height="wrap_content"
    background="#FFFFFFFF"
    click="true"
    function="frame_content"
    paddingLeft="10dp"
    paddingRight="10dp"
    paddingTop="10dp" >

    <ImageView
        id="@+id/image_pic"
        layout_width="50.5dp"
        layout_height="50.5dp"
        background="uri://list_item_shadow"
        contentDescription="@null"
        function="image"
        paddingBottom="5dp"
        paddingRight="5dp"
        src="placeholder"
        use="thumb" />

    <ImageView
        id="@+id/image_row"
        layout_width="15.5dp"
        layout_height="15.5dp"
        layout_alignParentRight="true"
        layout_centerVertical="true"
        contentDescription="@null"
        function="row" />

    <TextView
        id="@+id/title_text"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="wrap_content"
        layout_marginLeft="10dp"
        layout_marginRight="10dp"
        layout_toLeftOf="@+id/image_row"
        layout_toRightOf="@id/image_pic"
        ellipsize="end"
        function="title"
        singleLine="true"
        textColor="#FF000000"
        textSize="15dp"
        title_default_color="#FF000000"
        title_readed_color="#ff787878" />

    <TextView
        id="@+id/desc_text"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="wrap_content"
        layout_alignLeft="@+id/title_text"
        layout_alignRight="@+id/title_text"
        layout_below="@+id/title_text"
        descCheckScroll="true"
        ellipsize="end"
        function="desc"
        lines="2"
        textColor="#FF787878"
        textSize="12dp" />

    <ImageView
        id="@+id/image_divider"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="wrap_content"
        layout_below="@+id/image_pic"
        layout_marginTop="8.5dp"
        contentDescription="@null"
        scaleType="fitXY"
        src="line" />

</RelativeLayout>

head_item.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    layout_width="match_parent"
    layout_height="match_parent"
    orientation="vertical" >

    <ImageView
        id="@+id/head_item_img"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="fill_parent"
        click="true"
        contentDescription="@null"
        function="image"
        scaleType="fitXY"
        src="head_placeholder" />

</LinearLayout>

head.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    layout_width="match_parent"
    layout_height="match_parent"
    background="#FFFFFFFF" >

    <IndexHeadCircularViewPager
        id="@+id/bus_index_gallery"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="width*0.5"
        function="head_view_pager" />

    <LinearLayout
        id="@+id/bus_index_gallery_dot"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="30dp"
        layout_alignParentBottom="true"
        function="head_dot"
        gravity="center_vertical|right"
        orientation="horizontal"
        paddingRight="10dp" />

    <RelativeLayout
        id="@+id/bus_index_head_bar"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="30dp"
        layout_alignParentBottom="true"
        background="#BF000000" >

        <TextView
            id="@+id/bus_index_head_title"
            layout_width="wrap_content"
            layout_height="wrap_content"
            layout_centerVertical="true"
            layout_marginLeft="15dp"
            ellipsize="end"
            function="title"
            singleLine="true"
            textColor="#FFFFFFFF"
            textSize="14dp" />
    </RelativeLayout>

</RelativeLayout>

cat_head.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    layout_width="wrap_content"
    layout_height="wrap_content"
    layout_margin="5dp"
    orientation="vertical"
    select_bg="child_cat_bg"
    unselect_bg="#00000000" >

    <LinearLayout
        layout_width="wrap_content"
        layout_height="32dp"
        function="content_frame"
        orientation="horizontal" >

        <TextView
            id="@+id/cat_name"
            layout_width="width*0.17"
            layout_height="fill_parent"
            function="title"
            gravity="center"
            select_color="#FFFFFFFF"
            textColor="#FF000000"
            textSize="16dp"
            unselect_color="#FF000000" />
    </LinearLayout>

    <LinearLayout
        layout_width="wrap_content"
        layout_height="32dp"
        function="add_subscribe"
        orientation="horizontal" >

        <View
            layout_width="1dp"
            layout_height="fill_parent"
            background="#e5e5e5" />

        <ImageView
            id="@+id/child_cat_head_add_subcribe_img"
            layout_width="48dp"
            layout_height="fill_parent"
            contentDescription="@null"
            scaleType="center"
            src="subscribe_add" />
    </LinearLayout>

</LinearLayout>
